knimeNode.name: PredGPI Accessor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Provides access to the PredGPI web server using klunky CGI-access

intro.p: Provides access to the PredGPI server, http://gpcr.biocomp.unibo.it/predgpi/ from within KNIME, to provide identification clues for possible GPI-anchored proteins. It is very unlikely a partial protein fragment will produce a hit, the algorithm relies on C-Terminal residues being present. The software was trained on Arabidopsis and human proteins, refer to this paper for more details.
WARNING: the node gets data over the Internet and this makes your search data public - be careful with the data you give to this node.
WARNING: this node uses screen scraping (actually web scraping) to obtain the data. If the PredGPI website is changed, the node might produce incorrect results. Caveat emptor!

ports.inPort: One column is used to provide the protein sequences to predict on
